content.rendered:
The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing flat black Powder coat or can be colour coded as an option. All our parts are now zinc plated before powder coating to ensure a long rust free life. They are a 3mm and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in Black or can be optioned as stainless steel or colour coded with the rest of the bar. We also offer as standard, LED fog lights which are an extra on many other brands. Our bars are individually designed for each vehicle so as you can see look amazing without sticking way out and looking boxy.

 

Our 3D Evolution Bar will include:

Includes:

100% winch compatible with no additional brackets required

LED Fog lights as standard

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Parking sensor and headlamp washer compatible

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle

Middle winch cover can be left black if color coded to provide a great contrast

Shackles

Rhino4x4 Winch

Spotlight mounting bar

Spotlights and light bars

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT ISUZU DMAX 2012-2016

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
